Segmented Bowl Ring Cut Angles Chart

The following chart displays the different cut angles for segmented bowl ring segments. A sample bowl segment that shows dimension labels is displayed to the right.

Number of Ring Segments Cut Angle
6 30 degrees
8 22.5 degrees
9 20 degrees
10 18 degrees
12 15 degrees
15 12 degrees
18 10 degrees
20 9 degrees
24 7.5 degrees
30 6 degrees
36 5 degrees
40 4.5 degrees
45 4 degrees
60 3 degrees
72 2.5 degrees
90 2 degrees
120 1.5 degrees
